Subjects: prayers, by Christ and His Passion; Christ, wounds of
_description: A prayer by the Passion — four lines

BLSl2275.Transcription:
Jesu for þi woundes fiue / þou kepe hem weil in al þaire
                    lyue…
BLSl2275.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Middle English Lyrics: Handlist of New Texts.” 
             Anglia
         83 (1965): 35-47: 38.
